verbose_text: Protamine sulfate (PS) and LPS were instilled into the bladders of rats weekly for 5 weeks to induce longer lasting and chronic urothelial injury, which accurately mimics the chronic and inflammatory nature of IC/BPS XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: LPS were instilled into the bladders of rats weekly for 5 weeks to induce longer-lasting and chronic urothelial injury
